content: कपालः, --लं [कं शिरो जलं वा पालयति] {@--1@} The skull, skull-bone; चूडापीडकपालसंकुलगलन्मंदाकिनीवारयः <ls>Māl. 1. 2</ls>; रुद्रो येन कपालपाणिपुटके भिक्षाटनं कारितः <ls>Bh. 2. 95.</ls> {@--2@} A piece of a broken jar, potsherd; कपालेन भिक्षार्थी <ls>Ms. 8. 93.</ls> {@--3@} A multitude, collection. {@--4@} A beggar's bowl; <ls>Ms. 6. 44.</ls> {@--5@} A cup, jar in general; पंचकपाल. {@--6@} A cover or lid. {@--7@} A treaty of peace on equal terms. --लं {@--1@} The shell of an egg. {@--2@} The cotyla of the leg of a man, any flat bone. {@--3@} A kind of leprosy. --ली A beggar's bowl. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%caput%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%kephale%}].

कपालः, --लं [कं शिरो जलं वा पालयति] {@--1@} The skull, skull-bone; चूडापीडकपालसंकुलगलन्मंदाकिनीवारयः <ls>Māl. 1. 2</ls>; रुद्रो येन कपालपाणिपुटके भिक्षाटनं कारितः <ls>Bh. 2. 95.</ls> {@--2@} A piece of a broken jar, potsherd; कपालेन भिक्षार्थी <ls>Ms. 8. 93.</ls> {@--3@} A multitude, collection. {@--4@} A beggar's bowl; <ls>Ms. 6. 44.</ls> {@--5@} A cup, jar in general; पंचकपाल. {@--6@} A cover or lid. {@--7@} A treaty of peace on equal terms. --लं {@--1@} The shell of an egg. {@--2@} The cotyla of the leg of a man, any flat bone. {@--3@} A kind of leprosy. --ली A beggar's bowl. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%caput%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%kephale%}].
